decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (1529/5, 1529/2, 1529/1, 1529/4 - Received 05/12/2017. Environment Flood Risk Matrix - Received 06/12/2017. 1529/12B - received 07/02/2018) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the flank wall of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 6 - The new flank window at first floor level is to be obscurely glazed and fixed to a minimum height of 1.7m from floor level.
description: Modification to existing rear extension by squaring off the extension, replacing the roof with a new lower flat roof and parapet wall, insertion of Juliet balcony at first floor level, and insertion of new windows to side elevation at ground and first floor level
